channel.title: CVE Feed for Connectivity Standards Alliance -- connectedhomeip
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Connectivity Standards Alliance -- connectedhomeip

item.title: CVE-2024-3454|2024-07-24T07:58:40.219Z -- connectivity%20standards%20alliance -- connectedhomeip
item.description: An implementation issue in the Connectivity Standards Alliance Matter 1.2 protocol as used in the connectedhomeip SDK allows a third party to disclose information about devices part of the same fabric (footprinting), even though the protocol is designed to prevent access to such information.
